ing: 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger vodka (such as SkyyÂ®)
des: "A refreshing, simple drink on a hot summer day."
ins: Blend watermelon in a blender until smooth; strain through a fine mesh strainer and discard pulp. Pour strained watermelon juice, and vodka into a cocktail shaker filled with ice; strain into a glass. Squeeze lime juice into the cocktail.
